column2: This character has recently created some war dragons.
This character is the current holder of the national treasure known as the Fire Emblem.
The ruined buildings of a long-forgotten kingdom can be found in this province.
Most soldiers at this holding have abandoned their posts.
It is extremely difficult to recruit troops in this province.
Hostile peasants are preventing the normal collection of taxes in this province.
Angry mobs are a common sight. Tensions may escalate into outright revolt.
The banners are called, but not a soul turns up.
This character is proficient in the use of long-range combat magic.
A building unlike any constructed by human hands. It is waiting... waiting for the masters who abandoned it centuries past.
These lands have been ravaged by fire. Reconstruction will take some time.
This character has the art of summoning, binding, and draining the power of dragons down to a science.
This character uses quintessence on themselves regularly, preventing their body from succumbing to the ravages of age.
This character is considering a large-scale invasion of a foreign kingdom.
This character is charismatic, but profoundly unsettling. Their gaze draws you in, and you lose yourself in it...
This character is cold and distant. They show a wealth of knowledge of the world but are reluctant to become involved in political affairs.
This character has recently consumed a vulenary.
This character has recently consumed a concoction.
This character has recently consumed an elixir.
Most of the people in this province have been hunted down and killed.
This character is searching for a very special couple...
This character has loaned the services of their knight brigade to another ruler.
This character is adored by commoners across their realm..
This character is holding a child hunt.
This character is holding a witch hunt.
This character has recently conducted a child hunt.
This character has recently conducted a witch hunt.
Child hunts have been conducted in this province.
This province has been subject to aggressive hunts for followers of Loptous and descendants of the Loptyrian emperors.
This character is suspected of being a follower of Loptous, or at least sympathetic to the dark god's cause.
This character's Loptous holy blood has become public knowledge.
This character is in the middle of a ritual to create powerful undead generals.
Local leaders in this province suspected of disloyalty have been arrested and executed - or simply disappeared.
